amendment.description: Amendment lowers the amount for the Federal Aviation Administration's operating budget derived from the Aviation Trust Fund, changing the amount that comes from the Fund from $6 billion to $4.043 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Istook.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
